item.title: [DISTRELEC-3116] Order confirmation Mail
item.description: In the order-confirmatin email & Pdf. The email address of delivery-Address is not displayed correctly. Instead a variable is visible.

comments.comment: The delivery address never has an email address, there is always only one. Please remove the email address placeholder below the delivery address (or check whether it is not empty)
Removed the Delivery Email Adress. Resolved.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3109] Google Analytics eCommerce pixel is currently not sending values to Analytics
item.description:
The main problem is because the Tag is incomplete:

Google Analytics
Currently deployed is:
<div class="mod mod-analytics">
<!-- Google Analytics -->
<script>
ga('require', 'ecommerce', 'ecommerce.js'); // Load the ecommerce plug-in.
ga('ecommerce:addTransaction', {
                        'id' : '000016IO',          // Transaction ID. Required
                        'affiliation' : '',                // Affiliation or store name
                        'revenue' : '374.48', // Grand Total
                        'shipping' : '3.50',        // Shipping
                        'tax' : '75.60'                   // Tax
                        });
                                                
// addItem should be called for every item in the shopping cart.
ga('ecommerce:addItem', {
                        'id' : '000016IO',                                                                                  // Transaction ID. Required
                        'name' : 'Ladegerät NiMH/NiCd',                                               // Product name. Required
                        'sku' : '973671',                                                                                    // SKU/code
                        'category' : 'Ladegeräte NiMH / NiCd / NiZn',                  // Category or variation
                        'price' : '37.70',                                                                                    // Unit price
                        'quantity' : '1'                                                                                         // Quantity
                        });
                        
ga('send', 'ecommerce');                // Send transaction and item data to Google Analytics.
</script>
<!-- End Google Analytics -->
</div>

What needs to change:

Google Analytics(To be changed)
(function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
(i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
})(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

ga('create', 'UA-496118-2);
ga('send', 'pageview');

Required is (Full script with the correct id of the rollout):

Google Analytics
<!-- Google Analytics -->
<script>
(function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
(i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
})(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

ga('create', 'UA-496118-2);
ga('send', 'pageview');
ga('require', 'ecommerce', 'ecommerce.js');   // Load the ecommerce plug-in.
ga('ecommerce:addTransaction', {
  'id': '1234',                     // Transaction ID. Required
  'affiliation': '',   // Affiliation or store name
  'revenue': '11.99',               // Grand Total
  'shipping': '5',                  // Shipping
  'tax': '1.29'                     // Tax
});
// addItem should be called for every item in the shopping cart.
ga('ecommerce:addItem', {
  'id': '1234',                     // Transaction ID. Required
  'name': 'T-Shirt',                // Product name. Required
  'sku': 'DD44',                    // SKU/code
  'category': 'Green Medium',       // Category or variation
  'price': '11.99',                 // Unit price
  'quantity': '1'                   // Quantity
});
ga('send', 'ecommerce');      // Send transaction and item data to Google Analytics.

</script>
<!-- End Google Analytics -->
item.summary: Google Analytics eCommerce pixel is currently not sending values to Analytics

comments.comment:
Added the missing part and replaced the provided UA-496118-2 with the ${googleAnalyticsTrackingId} parameter and fixed an issue in the script (a ' was missing after the tracking id).

Note: This tracking is only implemented on the order confirmation page and only if a googleAnalyticsTrackingId UID is defined.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3088] Availability Definition AT
item.description:
Ich reviewe gerade die Availability-Logik im neuen Shop vorerst mal für AT. Im neuen Shop wurde die Logik soweit ich weiss mit dem Grundgedanken des Central-Warehouse in NL entwickelt. Mit der nun neu eingeführten Definition im aktuellen Shop entstehen nun schlechtere Lieferzeitangaben, obwohl bessere geleistet werden könnten - auch wenn das Inter-Company-Shipping nicht per Express ausgeführt wird.

Neue Definition: Artikel an Lager im Primary Warehouse des jeweiligen Landes werden mit 24h Lieferfrist ausgegeben, alles andere mit Lieferfrist innerhalb 10 Tagen.

Beispiel:
Wenn ein Artikel z.B. nur in DE an Lager ist, würde anhand der neuen Definition in AT dann „innert 10 Tagen" angezeigt werden (Dasselbe wie in Slowenien und in diesem Fall ginge der Artikel sogar über AT). Dies macht für mich irgendwie wenig Sinn.

Logik aktuell im neuen Shop(AT)

  • Von CH-Warehouse(600325): 24h
  • Von DE-Warehouse(602318): 48h
  • Von SE-Warehouse(604587): 48h

Logik anhand der neuen Spezifikation im Neuen Shop(AT)

  • Von CH-Warehouse: 24h
  • Von DE-Warehouse: innert 10 Tagen
  • Von SE-Warehouse: innert 10 Tagen

Hier müsste die Logistik genau prüfen, welche Fristen eingehalten werden können. Ich denke ein so allgemeine Definition(10d) macht wenig Sinn. Danke.

comments.comment:
Hallo Nando,

I won't be able to look at this into detail today. Could you please discuss it with Rafael B. and Florian. Thx.

The label for 48h is maintained as a property (there are multiple: product list, detail page, info layer on detail page, possibly more).
It can be adapted -> text issue.
Please note that no more than approx. 5 characters are available on most places (an exception being the info layer on the detail page).

Please advise Oana / Nabil if a change needs to be done, before today's deployment.

Note:
those properties can currently NOT be maintained per site (country). If this is changed for AT and a different label is needes for any other country, a follow-up CR needs to be created to adapt the handling and logic of this.

The availability Logic distinguishes between the following conditions(AT-specific):
- Primary Warehouse(CH): 24h
- Secondary Warehouses(SE, DE): 48h
- Not on stock: >48h

Now those texts have to change into this:
- Primary Warehouse(CH): 24h
- Secondary Warehouses(SE, DE): <10 d
- Not on stock: >10 d

On the following sites:
- Productdetail(including availability-detail overlay)
- Compare
- Lists(Search result)
  - Shopping List
  - Cart
  - Favorite
i attaached the diff from nabil

Rafael, one state is missing in your description. Currently we have four states:

green 24h
light green 48h
yellow 48h
orange 48h

Should we change it into this?

green 24h
light green 48h
yellow < 10d
orange > 10d

green 24h
light green 48h
yellow 48h < 10d
orange 48h > 10d

Is correct.
Thank you Florian, we changed the colored Dots and the Availability Popover accordingly.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3071] Create apache configuration to allow *.distrelec.at but protect prod.distrelec.[ch,de,it,com].distrelec.com
item.description:
• *.distrelec.at
    • should be accessible without password
  • prod.distrelec.[ch,de,it,com].distrelec.com
    • should be protected by password
item.summary: Create apache configuration to allow *.distrelec.at but protect prod.distrelec.[ch,de,it,com].distrelec.com

comments.comment: http://distrelec.at/ -> http://www.distrelec.at/ done

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3057] Rebate model doesn't work
item.description:
OS: Windows 7 Professional
Browser: IE 11.0.9600.16476 / Update Versions: 11.0.2
TS-33.9

Select an article e.g. 001425, log in as user distrelec.testing+17@gmail.com, pw: distrelec, the price should be reduced as there is a rebate of 7.5 percent deposited at this user, but the price is still the same. (img_373_pzu)

comments.comment:
Florian,
please analyze whether there is actually an issue.
Rebat model has been corrected through HMC and it works.

Hi Rene!
 
Please find attached an image fort he Maintenance page.
 
Under the image it should be the following text:
 
Entschuldigen Sie die Umstände.
Der normale Betrieb wird in Kürze wiederhergestellt.
Versuchen Sie es bitte später noch einmal!

Falls Sie Fragen oder Bestellungen haben, können uns von Mo - Do: 07:30 - 17:30; Fr: 07:30 - 16:00
unter <b>+43 1 334 10 10</b> telefonisch erreichen, per Fax
unter <b>+43 1 334 10 10 99</b> oder per e-mail unter info-at@distrelec.com
 
Please let me know if you have any further questions.
Regards,
Oana
Das ist eine normale HTML Page die wir direkt vom Apache ausliefern werden.
maintenance.html angehängt
Hi Oana, do you want the text as a red headline? Or just black text like the rest?
Moved the text snippet which was already there to the top.
Could I please receive one more screen shot (or link to this page)
you can reach the page at http://test.distrelec.ch/maintenance/maintenance.html

the page does not have:

Entschuldigen Sie die Umstände.

sentence.

actually it does contain this sentence, but this needs to be above the other text.

Again, this is the whole text:

Entschuldigen Sie die Umstände.
Der normale Betrieb wird in Kürze wiederhergestellt.
Versuchen Sie es bitte später noch einmal!

Falls Sie Fragen oder Bestellungen haben, können uns von Mo - Do: 07:30 - 17:30; Fr: 07:30 - 16:00
unter <b>+43 1 334 10 10</b> telefonisch erreichen, per Fax
unter <b>+43 1 334 10 10 99</b> oder per e-mail unter info-at@distrelec.com
It needs to be deployed first

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2902] Not able to add some products in basket
item.description: Every product with availability >48h give me an error message when trying to add to basket from product page and from search list.
item.summary: Not able to add some products in basket

comments.comment:
Only applies to AT, they work fine in CH.
for 11068286 (which is the product form the screenshot) there doesn't seem to be a punchout filter.
Rahpael, can you please have a look?
I don't have a filter in PIM.

The product doesn't have a price for AT, therefore it cannot be added to the cart.
Assigning to Raphael Leu for assessment on Movex side.

The SalesStatus for AT of that product seems to be EOL.
In this case, the behavior when calling the product detail page is not correct. Instead of the detail page, a redirect to the EOL page should occur.
=> This issue is handled in a separate ticket DISTRELEC-3093

...and it shouldn't be available in the search suggest layer.

Both are status 30.
I checked in the ERP and only one of them has an EOL status. Need check why we get the same status for both.

I'm confused since AT is 7320 and not 7330 mentioned above.

But both articles have no price for AT (7320). They have a price for IT (7330), but not for AT.

11068286 is in SalesStatus 60 (= EOL) for AT.
11071983 is in SalesStatus 30 for AT.

printscreen EOL_wrong_gopro contains incomplete artno 8 digit: 11071476

844598 PATONA Akku
11071983;7330;30;1;1;1;20140203011327
In MOVEX: Status 20 (active)

844595 GoPro Hero3+
11071476;7330;30;1;1;1;20140203011327
In MOVEX: Status 20 (active)

764878
11068286;7330;30;1;1;1;20140203011327
In MOVEX: Status 80 (EOL)
missed your comment. i'll look into it.

I checked the current webshop. The logic is:
- If no price, do not display: This is the case for those articles above

As the process won't allow to do pricing in the same time in all the countries we'll probably need to revise the process however in the mean time we can handle it with the punchout.

We'll prepare a list for it, handle it in PIM and maybe also import into Hybris to be sure that this happens before we golive.

As far as I know, there is currently no price check implemented. Articles even without a price will be displayed. In my opinion, it is ERP's responsibility to ensure "buyable" articles have a price. Or change the article status to something like "inactive" if no price exist.
However, if you want (like in the current shop) hybris to prevent priceless articles from being displayed, create a new Jira CR ticket.

If there is anything I can do, just let me know.
I'll check the process with CMs and the ERP team.

- Thomas Lang is instructing AT to provide prices in the ERP for the launch.
- Raphael Leu wasn't very much ok with changing the export. I'll take that up again for CH.
- We need to check that a full update for prices will provide a price for article 893462 (which doesn't have one in the new shop but should have one). Florian is requesting the full update.

- Most of them will recieve a price by tonight.
- The other ones are being punched out into Hybris and we added a suppress shop in PIM to always get the punch out for those products.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2721] update local.properties for PROD environment
item.description: i think the best way is to use the Q local.properties files as template
